paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses several variants in the KCNH2 gene, specifically G601S, F805C, and R752W, with a focus on their functional effects and implications for long QT syndrome type 2.

individual_records.phenotype_details: experienced syncope and diagnosed with LQT2
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 1 experienced syncope and was diagnosed with LQT2 at age 28.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQT2 after family history of arrhythmias
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 2 was diagnosed with LQT2 at age 31 after a family history of arrhythmias.

functional_data.summary: G601S mutation leads to impaired trafficking of Kv11.1 protein.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence from functional studies and family segregation.
variants.additional_notes: G601S is a well-studied variant associated with LQT2.
key_quotes: G601S-Kv11.1 protein is excluded from ER exit sites and sequestered in a microtubule-sensitive ER compartment.
This study has identified a novel way to categorize trafficking-deficient LQT2 mutations based on differences in intracellular retention.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQT2 after experiencing palpitations.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 3 was diagnosed with LQT2 at age 28 after experiencing palpitations.

individual_records.phenotype_details: no symptoms but carries the variant.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 4 carries the F805C variant but remains asymptomatic.

functional_data.summary: F805C mutation leads to altered intracellular retention of Kv11.1 protein.

variants.additional_notes: F805C is associated with impaired Kv11.1 tetramer assembly.
key_quotes: F805C-Kv11.1 protein was concentrated in several transitional ER subcompartments.
Unlike G601S, F805C does not undergo pharmacological correction with E-4031.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQT2 after cardiac arrest.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 5 was diagnosed with LQT2 at age 39 after a cardiac arrest.

individual_records.phenotype_details: carries the variant but has not experienced symptoms.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 6 carries the R752W variant but has not experienced symptoms.

functional_data.summary: R752W mutation leads to impaired Kv11.1 protein function.

variants.additional_notes: R752W is associated with significant functional impairment.
key_quotes: R752W-Kv11.1 protein shows distinct immunostaining patterns.
This variant is linked to severe forms of LQT2.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of KCNH2 variants associated with LQT2

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and tables.
